verses.text: Blessed \w are|strong="H3068"\w* all \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* fear \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w that|strong="H3068"\w* walk \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* ways.

\w For|strong="H3651"\w* thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* labours \w of|strong="H3427"\w* thy hands: blessed art thou, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H3427"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w well|strong="H3651"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* thee.
Thy wife \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fruitful|strong="H6529"\w* vine, \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sides \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy house.

Behold, \w thus|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3651"\w* \w man|strong="H1368"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* blessed \w that|strong="H3651"\w* feareth \w the|strong="H3651"\w* Lord.

\w May|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord bless thee \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* Sion: \w and|strong="H0954"\w* mayest thou \w see|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* good \w things|strong="H1992"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* Jerusalem \w all|strong="H0954"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* days \w of|strong="H8179"\w* thy life.
And mayest thou see thy childrenâ€™s children, peace upon Israel.
